reviewText: Very interesting a good movie . Gripping ar times intense
This is like a perfect blend of Bergman and Tarkovskij. Not for everyone, of course.

"Sisters or the Balance of Happiness" is a beautiful movie by Margarethe von Trotta, one of her best. A marvellous cast and a poignant, beautifully told story.

Unfortunately, the DVD is a mere, sloppy VHS transfer with washed-out colours and hard-coded subtitles.
